# AccessoryTransportSession.EventHandler

**Protocol**

A protocol that defines methods for handling events for the session.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol EventHandler
```

## Overview

You provide this type to a session request when handling the [doc://com.apple.AccessoryTransportExtension/documentation/AccessoryTransportExtension/AccessoryTransportSession/Request/accept(_:)] method.

## Handling session cancellation

- **invalidationHandler(error:)**: Handles cancellation of the session, in response to a call from the framework.
- **AccessoryTransportSession.Error**: A type that defines errors encountered when using an accessory transport session.
